title.value: Perspectives on virtual interviews and emerging technologies integration in family medicine residency programs: a cross-sectional survey study
title.justification: The title clearly communicates the focus on virtual interviews and emerging tech in family medicine residency.
title.quote: Perspectives on virtual interviews and emerging technologies integration in family medicine residency programs: a cross-sectional survey study

extractions.description: This study investigates the perspectives of interviewers and applicants on the use of virtual interviews and emerging technologies such as AI and VR in family medicine residency programs during the COVID-19 pandemic through a cross-sectional survey.

type.justification: The study gathers data through surveys on participantsâ€™ perceptions, making it an empirical study.
type.quote: We therefore decided to undertake an empirical investigation guided by the following research questions...

name.justification: The study focuses on educational processes in medical residency programs.
name.quote: Keywords Medical residency, Family medicine, Virtual interview, Artificial intelligence, Virtual reality

name.justification: The paper discusses the integration of AI in medical education and practice.
name.quote: Almost all interviewees (95.8%) were interested in learning about AI and VR and its application in clinical practice.

name.justification: The study explores the use of VR in medical residency recruitment.
name.quote: emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) and virtual reality (VR) have also been expanding within the medical field
